title: Can ezreal get a 5th ability?
body: He only has a passive, q , e and r at this point, that excuse of a spell he has on W is basically a meme, can he get an actual spell instead of it?

replies.body: It is good poke on AP Ez. I would like if he were given a new W that still works well on AP Ezreal.
riot shouldn't kill different versions of playstyle with reworks AMIRITE {{champion:107}}

Ezreal's fifth ability is the one where he steals my heart <3

 http://www.auplod.com/u/pdolua802d6.png

All they really have to do is make it so his W will always give himself the attack speed boost, that way he doesn't have to use his arcane shift into it to get the attack speed. If that is not enough then add a small AD ratio on it as well. The ability itself is pretty good but really only useful for allied unless you waste your escape to dash in front of it. This way his AD potential will be increased while not effecting his AP style either.
